ovdesc.p: The bank wish to be able to “take on” an account into T24 mid way through an accrual period. To do this they need to be able to input the accrued to date figures manually into T24 and update P&L and the CRF accrual figures. When the account capitalises it will combine the manual accrual figure and the calculated T24 figure to produce the capitalisation amount. The accrual adjustments will apply to the current capitalisation period only
